column2: List of adducts separated by a comma and a space. Example: [M + H]+, [M + Na]+, [M - H2O + H]+, [M - H3N + H]+
Desired mass ppm error threshold for matching algorithm

column1: Below is a list of example adduct choices from the SIRIUS GUI for positive and negative ion modes.
Custom adducts can be used but must follow Iupac convention for the matching to work. For example the adduct [M - NH3 + H]+ should be written as [M - H3N + H]+.
